item.description:
We'll Meet Next to the Concierge Desk!

Built in Rockland, Maine in 1853, and named after a Native American Chief of the Seneca Tribe, the clipper ship Red Jacket was known as the “swiftest clipper of her time.” On her maiden voyage in 1854 she set a record for the fastest trans-Atlantic crossing by a commercial sailing vessel. That record remains unbroken to this day, more than 150 years after it was established.

The story of the clipper ship Red Jacket and the Haunted Hotel begins on the foggy shores of Yarmouth, Cape Cod. Born in 1809 to a family of Yarmouth seamen, Asa Eldridge, the ship’s first captain, was one of the most respected captains to sail the seas. Captain Eldridge continued his prestigious sailing career until 1856, when his ship and all those aboard mysteriously disappeared during a winter crossing of the Atlantic.

Legend has it (at least for this weekend) that the ghosts of Captain Eldridge and his crew have returned to his birthplace to haunt the hotel bearing the same name as his beloved ship. Join Captain Asa Eldridge and his ghoulish crew for a fun-filled spooky weekend at the Red Jacket Beach Resort.

 

Stay October 26th and 27th (two nights) for $99/night and get 2 complimentary costume bash tickets! Or stay one night for $159, Saturday October 27th & purchase tickets separately Or just come for the party on Saturday October 27th!

 

Enjoy dancing, live music, prizes for best costumes and spooky special effects. And best of all, help the Cape community by donating non-perishable food items.

Live music and dancing with Business Time

  • Themed decorations and special effects
  • Free appetizers and cash bar
  • Doors open at 8 p.m. for this 21+ party
  • $15 per person with donation of two non-perishable food items
  • ($20 without donation)

 

TICKET SALES ARE LIMITED! Please call (508) 398-6941

NOTE:  Invite your friends, husbands, boyfriends and significant others!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the hotel lobby near the concierge desk!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Haunted Hotel Costume Bash with Accomodations Available only for the Brave!
